body_html:
You seem to have a version mismatch on your command line to do setup

sudo sh -c "echo '/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64' >> /etc/ld.so.conf.d/nvidia.conf"

but you are building with cuda 9.0. Try removing the cuda 8 stuff if it is still there.
body_text:
You seem to have a version mismatch on your command line to do setup
sudo sh -c "echo '/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64' >> /etc/ld.so.conf.d/nvidia.conf"

but you are building with cuda 9.0. Try removing the cuda 8 stuff if it is still there.
body:
You seem to have a version mismatch on your command line to do setup
```
sudo sh -c "echo '/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64' >> /etc/ld.so.conf.d/nvidia.conf"
```

but you are building with cuda 9.0. Try removing the cuda 8 stuff if it is still there.
